patthana10.8:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.8:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanoupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana10.8:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.8:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nanokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
